text:
e="preserve"> was a Japanese volleyball player. He competed in the 1964 Summer Olympics and in the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born in Saga Prefecture, Japan. In 1964 he was part of the Japanese team which won the bronze medal and won the silver medal in the 1968 Olympic tournament.
Ikeda died on 3 January 2021 in Tokyo from lymphoma, aged 80.
